title: Silk, Wool, and Beyond: AI-Driven Design of Custom Protein Fibers
cleaned_text: AI-Driven Design of Custom Protein Fibers](https://www.bakerlab.org/2023/09/05/ai-driven-design-of-custom-protein-fibers/) Today we report in Nature Chemistry a novel approach to designing protein fibers that takes inspiration from silk, wool, and spider webs. This research opens up new avenues in textiles, bioengineering, and beyond.
